channel.title: 2 week ban?
channel.description:
hey guys my friend got banned for 2 weeks.... not that interesting.. ? how aboout if i tell he got banned for 2 weeks 1 YEAR AND A HALF AGO.. and is STILL banned...
his ban says " 2 week ban bla bla bla"
his name is .Kaboom aka Thewiseguy..
I think this is unfair

item.title: 2 week ban?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:4, topic:348060”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=444441.msg3263239#msg3263239 date=1278667196]

hey guys it’s .kaboom, i rage quit after being banned but I want my old account back plz

I remember you, what was the ban for?
[/quote]
Probably some Tico injustice-ness. I remember him as well.[/quote]

Humorous, yet I believe your blatant dis-respect and language towards a staff member the last time.

@Topic owner, let your friend deal with it himself, by contacting a staff member on IRC or something of the sort. Don’t post about it.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 week ban?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“Fuzzyrider123, post:1, topic:348060”]hey guys my friend I got banned for 2 weeks… not that interesting…? how aboout if i tell you I got butthurt for being banned for 2 weeks and I probably did something retarded to get banned AGAIN. This happened a YEAR AND A HALF AGO… and I’m STILL banned…

My ban says " 2 week ban bla bla bla"

My account name is .Kaboom aka Thewiseguy…

I think this is unfair. I should be banned longer than a year. Also, I suck cocks.[/quote]I believe this is what you meant.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 week ban?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

I remember .Kaboom’s runescape account was called Fuzzyrider. You should be banned on this account too for ban evading.

Read full topic

I am pretty sure this is a ban evade. The guy who got banned is you I can tell.
